description: Fr. Mike talks about how God can bring great triumph from great brokenness as we read the messy story of Judah and Tamar.  Today's readings are Genesis 38, Job 29-30, and Proverbs 3:28-32. For the complete reading plan, visit ascensionpress.com/bibleinayear. Please note: The Bible contains adult themes that may not be suitable for children - parental discretion is advised.

name: Day 20: Judah and Tamar (2022)
